CustomField.inlineHelpText: The denominator for the amount of medication contained in the packaged product when the dose is a ratio or a range. If the medication dosage is a ratio, specify the denominator value. If the medication dosage is a range, specify the upper dosage value. Examples: If quantity is 10 units/ml, then enter 10 in Quantity Numerator and 1 in this field. If quantity is 1-2 pills/day, then enter 1 in Quantity Numerator and 2 in this field.
